outline:
1. to go through, flee, run away, chase, drive away, put to flight, reach, shoot (extend), hurry away
    1. (Qal)
      1. to go, pass through
      2. to flee
      3. to hasten, come quickly
    2. (Hiphil)
      1. to pass through
      2. to cause to flee, put to flight
      3. to drive away
kjv_def: chase (away); drive away, fain, flee (away), put to flight, make haste, reach, run away, shoot.
strongs_def: to bolt, i.e. figuratively, to flee suddenly
